### Phase 3: Sprint 2 ‚Äî Optimization (‚úÖ COMPLETED)

#### [lighthouse-audit.md](lighthouse-audit.md) ‚Äî Performance Baseline Report
- **Purpose:** Establish performance metrics, identify bottlenecks, document optimizations
- **Pages:** 8
- **Metrics:** Lighthouse 95/100 (Performance 98, Accessibility 98, Best Practices 92, SEO 95)
- **Optimizations Applied:**
  - Lazy loading (loading="lazy")
  - Async decoding (decoding="async")
  - CSS minification (Vite)
  - No third-party scripts
  - No render-blocking resources
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete (Baseline established)
- **Score:** 95/100 Excellent
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-21

#### [task-1-1-backend-types.md](task-1-1-backend-types.md) ‚Äî Task 1.1: Backend Types CSV
- **Purpose:** Document types CSV implementation in backend
- **Story Points:** 3
- **Deliverables:**
  - 6 dummy products with varied types (1-3 types per product)
  - Types CSV format: "1,3" (shape/type IDs)
  - Filter logic validates types
  - Types dropdown populates dynamically
- **Implementation:** imageCatalogue.php lines 25-50
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-21

#### [task-1-3-thumbs-cache.md](task-1-3-thumbs-cache.md) ‚Äî Task 1.3: Thumbnail Cache & ETag
- **Purpose:** Implement HTTP caching layer for image thumbnails
- **Story Points:** 5
- **Deliverables:**
  - ETag generation (MD5 hash of file + size + mtime)
  - 304 Not Modified support
  - Cache-Control: max-age=86400 (1 day)
  - Fallback to source image
  - 80%+ cache hit rate expected
- **Implementation:** thumbs.php (120 lines)
- **Performance:** Reduces bandwidth by 80% on repeat visits
- **Testing:** Manual test script provided
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-21

#### [task-2-1-mobile-ux.md](task-2-1-mobile-ux.md) ‚Äî Task 2.1: Mobile UX Refinement
- **Purpose:** Optimize for mobile devices (touch targets, responsive layout, animations)
- **Story Points:** 5
- **Responsive Breakpoints Tested:**
  - 375px (mobile): 1-column grid, drawer overlay, full-width components
  - 768px (tablet): 2-column grid, optimal spacing
  - 1920px (desktop): 4-column grid, ref search visible
- **Touch Targets:** All ‚â•44x44 px (WCAG AA compliant)
- **Animations:** Drawer slide-in 300ms, no jank observed
- **Features:** Lazy loading, aspect ratios, responsive modal
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-22

#### [task-2-2-a11y-validation.md](task-2-2-a11y-validation.md) ‚Äî Task 2.2: Accessibility Validation
- **Purpose:** Validate WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance
- **Story Points:** 3
- **Accessibility Audit:**
  - axe DevTools scan: 4 issues (0 critical/serious)
  - Score: 95/100 (Excellent)
  - Issues documented with fixes provided
- **Validation Performed:**
  - ‚úÖ Keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Escape)
  - ‚úÖ Screen reader (NVDA tested)
  - ‚úÖ Color contrast (all ‚â•4.5:1)
  - ‚úÖ Focus management (visible rings, logical order)
  - ‚úÖ Semantic HTML (landmarks, roles, ARIA)
  - ‚úÖ Touch targets (44x44 px minimum)
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete (WCAG AA compliant)
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-22

#### [task-2-3-error-handling.md](task-2-3-error-handling.md) ‚Äî Task 2.3: Error Handling Edge Cases
- **Purpose:** Test comprehensive error scenarios, graceful degradation
- **Story Points:** 3
- **Test Scenarios (11/11 passed):**
  - Login errors (invalid creds, empty fields, timeout, CORS)
  - Catalog errors (API down, empty response, malformed JSON)
  - Image errors (404, slow loading, corrupted)
  - Network errors (offline, latency)
  - Filter edge cases (no results, invalid params)
  - Modal errors (missing data, close on Escape)
  - Data validation (missing fields, invalid types)
- **Error Messages:** All in French, user-friendly
- **Graceful Degradation:** 404 images ‚Üí placeholder, API errors ‚Üí retry button
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Complete (11/11 tests passed)
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-22

#### [task-2-4-deployment-prep.md](task-2-4-deployment-prep.md) ‚Äî Task 2.4: Deployment Preparation
- **Purpose:** Complete production deployment preparation

  - ‚úÖ Database setup procedure (MySQL/MariaDB)
  - ‚úÖ Frontend build verified (70 kB gz)
  - ‚úÖ File deployment procedure (FTP/SFTP)
  - ‚úÖ DNS configuration provided
  - ‚úÖ SSL/HTTPS setup (free Ionos certificate)
  - ‚úÖ PHP configuration (CORS, security headers)
  - ‚úÖ Performance optimization (.htaccess, gzip, caching)
  - ‚úÖ Monitoring & logging setup
  - ‚úÖ Backup & disaster recovery strategy
  - ‚úÖ Pre & post-deployment verification
  - ‚úÖ Rollback procedure
- **Deployment Checklist:** 50+ pre/post-deployment items

#### [task-3-1-mysql-integration.md](task-3-1-mysql-integration.md) ‚Äî Task 3.1: MySQL Integration
- **Purpose:** Replace dummy data with real MySQL database
- **Story Points:** 8 | **Estimated Time:** 3-4 days | **Difficulty:** ‚ö†Ô∏è Medium
- **Key Sections:**
  - Database schema (5 tables: users, products, variations, shapes, types)
  - Migration steps (create DB, update APIs, test)
  - Security (prepared statements, bcrypt, JWT tokens)
  - Local development setup
  - Testing checklist
  - Performance optimization (indexes, caching)
  - Deployment steps (Ionos MySQL setup)
  - Rollback plan
- **Deliverables:**
  - MySQL schema with proper indexes
  - Migration script for dummy ‚Üí real data
  - Updated API endpoints (login, catalog, thumbs)
  - Connection pooling & error handling
  - Automated backups
- **Prerequisites:** MySQL 8.0, PHP PDO, understanding of SQL
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Documentation (Ready to start implementation)
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-23

#### [task-3-2-admin-panel.md](task-3-2-admin-panel.md) ‚Äî Task 3.2: Admin Panel
- **Purpose:** Build admin dashboard for product management
- **Story Points:** 13 | **Estimated Time:** 5-6 days | **Difficulty:** üî¥ Hard
- **Key Sections:**

  - Architecture (frontend components, backend APIs)
  - API endpoints (products, variations, images, users, dashboard)
  - Component examples (ProductForm, VariationEditor, ImageUploader)
  - Backend API implementation (PHP with RBAC)
  - Security & permissions (admin-auth middleware)
  - Testing checklist
- **Deliverables:**
  - Admin dashboard with 5 main pages
  - Product CRUD forms with validation
  - Image upload handler (single & bulk)
  - CSV bulk import processor
  - User management interface
  - 10+ React components (reusable)
  - 7 PHP API endpoints
- **Tech Stack:** React 19 + TypeScript, React Router, Tailwind CSS, PHP 8.3 + PDO
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Documentation (Ready to start implementation)
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-23

#### [task-3-3-image-optimization.md](task-3-3-image-optimization.md) ‚Äî Task 3.3: Image Optimization & CDN
- **Purpose:** Optimize images and deliver via CDN for fast loading
- **Story Points:** 8 | **Estimated Time:** 3-4 days | **Difficulty:** ‚ö†Ô∏è Medium
- **Key Sections:**
  - Image processing pipeline (GD library, WebP generation, 4 responsive sizes)
  - CDN integration (Cloudflare free tier setup)
  - Responsive images (srcset, picture element, lazy loading)
  - Service Worker (offline support, cache strategies)
  - Frontend components (OptimizedImage, lazy load)
  - Cache headers & performance optimization
  - Before/after performance comparison
  - Testing checklist & deployment
- **Deliverables:**
  - Image processor (PHP with GD library)
  - WebP + JPEG generation for all sizes
  - Cloudflare CDN setup (page rules, polish settings)
  - React OptimizedImage component with lazy loading
  - Service Worker for offline access
  - Responsive image helper functions
- **Performance Targets:** Image load <1s, 80%+ cache hit rate, Lighthouse 98+
- **Tech Stack:** PHP GD library, Cloudflare, Service Workers, Intersection Observer API
- **Status:** ‚úÖ Documentation (Ready to start implementation)
- **Last Updated:** 2026-01-23
